episode_event_general_autumn_2020/6701_1:
Fight or fright! Face me in a Pokémon battle, or I’ll
play a scary trick on yooou! Tee-hee!

Wahh! Acerola, I told you not to sneak up on me
like that!

We said we weren’t gonna start any of that until
we go out later tonight, remember?

Oops! Sorry, Hilbert! I guess I just got a little
too excited...

Sorry about that, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
We’re actually getting ready to do some trick-or-
treating in town tonight.

Yeah! Only on Pasio, there’s a special rule:
you have to say “Fight or fright!” and have a
Pokémon battle!

Then when the battle is over, the loser has to give
the winner some of their candy. Tee-hee!
Oh! Were you wondering about my costume?

I thought dressing up would make trick-or-treating
more fun for all the tiny tots out there tonight!

What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Wanna come with us and get some candy?!
Yeah, why don’t you join us? It’ll be fun!

We’ll probably head over soon, but you can meet
up with us later when you’re ready, OK?
See you there!
episode_event_general_autumn_2020/6801_1:
We’re going to get soooo
much candy!

Fight or friiiiight! Tee-hee!
Acerola here, ready for some trick-or-treating!

I’m all set, too! I can’t wait to get out there and
see what sort of battles await us tonight!
